channel.title: General Chicago Cta on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Chicago Cta on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: I am going to punch the CTA in the face
item.description: Seriously. so my chicago car plus card was deactivated cuz my credit card info was invalid and my company(or lack there of) stopped paying for my transit. SO i updated my credit card info, purchased a $75 dollar 30 day pass and called it good. they said to wait 3 days. i attempted - but apparently didn’t wait 3 solid days - so they deactivated my card again. wtf. so i ordered a new card and then called.
